article: Maha Samaj members have met Social welfare Minister & OBC welfare Minister Sri H. Anjaneya and Uday Kumar Singh (founder ABEM) on 28th Feb, 2017 to seek their support and help for the welfare of the community. Maha Samaj Secretary Mr. Venkat Rao along with other community members (Shashi kumar, Prem raj,Mahdev rao, Mahesh Babu, Uday, Prasad, Shantaram & Krishnaji and others) were present at the meeting. Clicking here for more details
4G Labs Bangalore has developed an exclusive app for Maha Katik Samaj. Stay tune for more updates through the new app for Maha Samaj lead by Shree Shantaram, President
